title: Courgetti spaghetti with tomato and butter bean pesto
description: This super-quick, no-cook, no-fuss vegan dish is a delicious and healthy alternative to traditional spaghetti pesto.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe, you will need a julienne peeler.This meal provides 378 kcal, 10g protein, 14g carbohydrate (of which 5g sugars), 31g fat (of which 6g saturates), 11g fibre and 0.9g salt per portion.
ingredients: 75g/2½oz fresh basil, reserve a few leaves to garnish
salt and freshly ground black pepper
2 large ripe avocados, skin and seeds removed, chopped
